name: Magnet Madness!
description:
• Use A, Q, or Spacebar to change polarity.
  • Pickup stars to increase your score and energy.
  • If your energy reaches 0, you lose!
  • After you collect enough stars, difficulty increases and more challenging levels are generated.

Not enough time for a game menu, or a browser build sadly :(

Thanks for taking the time to download the game!

---------
